While this may have merit as a sort of infomercial, I take issue with the narration of ALL the vids in this series. First, the writing is abundantly laced with silly hyperbole, and then the narrator’s over-emotional delivery sounds like a very-weak tv ad. It so detracts from the content. The super-abrupt endings each time are further tiresome. People were PAID to produce these? Why?
